Deficiency Narrative: During the time of inspection, the medication storage was observed to not have a secondary locking mechanism for the psychotropic medications. The medications are stored behind a locked closet door in a filing cabinet that does not lock.
Correction Narrative: The operation came into compliance by fixing the locking mechanism on the filing cabinet where Psychotropic medications are kept. Video was recorded and can be found in document library.

Deficiency Narrative: Service plan did not include a plan to address the five high-risk behaviors documented
Correction Narrative: Operation provided child's service plan with the 5 updated High-risk behaviors by describing the behavior and plan.

Deficiency Narrative: Several serious incident reports did not mention what staff did to stop the kids from running from the operation.
Correction Narrative: An email was received from the administrator on 6/11/2024. The operation had a staff meeting on 6/11/2024. It was discussed that staff will document what they did to prevent and intervene during incidents as runaways and etc.  Each staff signed the memo. The memo can be found in the document library.
